title: Frumpy the Clown, Volume 1: Freaking Out the Neighbors
description: Before Road Trip, before Barry Ween, there was Frumpy the Clown! When Frumpy enters the home of a typical American family, the children, Brad and Kim, are ecstatic. Their parents, neighbors, and local law enforcement, on the other hand, wish he would go away.
author: Judd Winick
